"What are the symptoms of Limb-girdle muscular dystrophy, type 2G ?","What are the signs and symptoms of Limb-girdle muscular dystrophy, type 2G? The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for Limb-girdle muscular dystrophy, type 2G.
